definitions.body: denoting possession, belonging to;—(a) as predicate, in [[הָיָה לְ]] (cf. Ps 50:16 [[מַהלּלְּ ְלְ]]. (b) here also belongs the so-called Lamed auctoris, Is 38:9 [[מִכְתָּב לְחִזְקִיׇּהוּ]] a writing belonging to, of, or by H., Hb Hab 3:1, Ps 3:1 and oft. [[מזמור לדוד]] a Psalm of or by D. (but possibly denoting orig., at least in some cases, a Psalm belonging to a collection known as David's: so certainly in [[לבני קרח]] Ps 42:1 al., and prob. also in [[לאסף]] Ps 50:1 al.); so [[לדוד מזמור]] Ps 24:1 +, [[לדוד]] alone Ps 10:1 m Ps 14:1 +. definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: attached to advbs., esp. those compounded with [[מִן]], it forms preps., as [[מִקֶּדֶם לְ]] Ge 3:24 lit. off the front with reference to (or of) = in front of: so [[מִבֵּית לְ]] = within, [[מִחוּץ לְ]] = without, [[מִמַּעַל לְ]], [[מֵעַל לְ]], [[מֵעֵבֶר לְ]], [[מֵהָֽלְאָה לְ]], [[מִצְּפוֹן לְ]], [[סָבִׂיב לְ]] (all oft.); more rarely, [[מֵאַחֲרֵי לְ]], [[מִ֫בַּעַד לְ]], [[מִבֵּינוֹת לְ]], [[אֶל בֵּינוֹת לְ]], [[מִזֶּה וּמִזֶּה לְ]] Ex 38:15, [[הֵנׇּה לְ]], Da 12:5; Da 12:5, [[מִזְרָח לְ]], [[מִימִין לְ]], [[מִנֶֶּגֶד לְ]], [[מִסָּבִיב לְ]], [[תַּחַת לְ]], poet. [[נֶגְדָּה־נׇּא לְ]], † Ps 116:14, Ps 116:18. See [[בית]], [[חוץ]], etc.; and cf. Ju Jdg 7:1, Jdg 7:8.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: construed with passive verbs, the [[ל]] of reference notifies the agent, as [[בָּרוּח לְ]] blessed by, Ge 14:17 + oft.; otherwise not very common, Ge 14:17 + oft.; otherwise not very common, Ge 31:15 [[נֶחְשַׁב לְ]] to be reckoned by (so Is 40:17), Ex 12:16 [[אַח אֲשֶׁר יֵאָכֵל לְכָל־נֶפֶשׁ חוּא לְבַדּוֹ]], [[יֵעָשֶׂה לָכם]], 1Sa 2:3, 1Sa 25:7, 2Sa 19:43, Je 8:3 [[נִבְחַר לְ]] (Pr 21:3), Pr 29:22, Ps 73:10, Ps 111:2, Pr 13:13 [[יֵחָבֶל־לוֹ]] is pledged by it, Pr 14:20, Ne 6:1, Ne 6:7 [[נִשְׁמַע לְ]], Ne 13:26 [[אָהוּב לְ]], Es 4:3, Es 5:12, Ec 5:12 [[שָׁמוּר לְ]]. So with [[נִרְאָה]] Ex 13:7 ( = De 16:4), [[נוֹדַע]] 1Sa 6:3, Ez Eze 36:32, Ne 4:9 (but usu. with these words [[לְ]] is rather the dat. comm.. be known, appear, to), [[נעתר]] Ge 25:21 +, [[נדרשׁ]] and [[נמחא]] Is 65:1 + to let oneself be entreated, sought, found, by, [[נוֹסַר]] † Le 26:23, [[נענה]] † Ez Eze 14:4, Eze 14:7 (?). (Comp. in Syr. Nö:§ 247, esp. with pass. ptcp.:§ 279 (so Talm., Luz:§ 90), which in Mand. and New Syr. even unites with the [[ל]] to form a new tense, v. Nö:M § 263; NS § 104.) Analogously Ge 38:15 [[וַתַּהַר לוֹ]] and was pregnant by, v:Ge 38:18 [[הָרָה לְ]] (adj.) pregnant by (lit. to).
